description: Turn on/off Retweets and device notifications from the specified user.

parameters.description: The screen name of the user being followed.
parameters.name: screen_name

parameters.description: The ID of the user being followed.
parameters.name: user_id

parameters.description: Turn on/off device notifications from the target user.
parameters.name: device

parameters.description: Turn on/off Retweets from the target user.
parameters.name: retweets
